title: Full Store Analysis Report

steps.title: Produce the Full Store Analysis Report document

Arrange a time to run through the report
stepItems.description: Would you like to arrange a time with Luke to run through the report and the findings?
stepItems.help: Please email luke@thepixelcrowd.com to arrange a time and date for a meeting

description:
A Full Store Analysis Report is an in-depth written version of a top line review and covers additional areas.

The full written report will break down the issues your store is facing, show the impact of the issues, provide understandable examples and also provide solutions which can be implemented by store owners or with our help.

The in-depth report which we will produce is custom to your store, includes a lot of actionable suggestions of how you can create new content and market your site to reach new customers and increase your audience via social media etc.

All suggestions will help to increase sales. The report will give you a clear list of actions, ordered by priority to implement based on impact.

The report will include the following areas:

  • Full SEO audit of technical site elements and setup
  • Google Analytics audit and suggestions for changes
  • Webmaster Tools account audit and suggestions for changes
  • Store features / content review and suggestions
  • Content marketing reviews and ideas
  • Marketing plan for your store
  • Actionable ideas for outreach and link building campaigns
  • Outline improvements to email marketing emails and customer emails
  • Highlight high quality resources and tools to help improve your store

These reports are a lot more in-depth than the standard Plug In SEO projects and have been used by past clients of ours, to create an online marketing strategy for their stores, as well getting a clear understanding of their current position and the challenges which they face.

Store Analysis Reports can also be used to instruct developers on which changes you would like to be made to your store.

The report is produced by Luke, a seasoned SEO and online marketing consultant.

Luke has worked with stores and clients of all sizes from hobby stores who are just starting out, to global brands.

Reports will benefit greatly from his experience and arm store owners with a huge list of ideas to put in place to improve their stores!

Examples of past reports can be shared on requested. Please contact luke@thepixelcrowd.com for additional information.
